description: This file is a test script for the HelloWorld Vue component, using the 'vitest' testing framework and '@vue/test-utils' for component mounting.

methods.name: describe
methods.description: Defines a test suite for the HelloWorld component.

methods.name: it
methods.description: Defines an individual test case to verify the rendering of the HelloWorld component.

methods.name: expect
methods.description: Asserts that the component's text contains the expected message.

ctags.name: wrapper
ctags.pattern: /^    const wrapper = mount(HelloWorld, { props: { msg: 'Hello Vitest' } })$/
